channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Marissa Barlaz

item.title: R Graphing Workshop
item.description: The aim of this workshop is to teach you the ins and outs of using the ggplot2 package in R.

item.title: R Modeling Workshop
item.description: The aim of this workshop is to teach you the basics of statistical models in R.
